tweets.text:
It's #WorldRiversDay! #Rivers are the veins of our #environment & we must protect (and enhance) them! 

These are some of our favourite parts of our catchment. What are your favourite rivers? Let us know!   
#togetherforrivers https://t.co/mtwQq1TyJh

The #FCERMStrategy is now a legally binding document

It informs our future direction to help make millions of homes and businesses more resilient to #Flooding #CoastalErosion and #ClimateChange

Read more: https://t.co/H11CyMb2v8 https://t.co/p0Yl8p64mZ

tweets.text: It's been busy this week with restoration works along the River Mease. This is just the start!Thanks to all our supporters and partners @Rewildmidlands @IanCogs @Trent_R_Trust @EnvAgencyMids @NEEastMidlands @wmlongreach #gravelintroduction #naturalprocesses #farmerengagement https://t.co/o0wnFFt5hP

I've asked to interview @JamesBevanEA @EmmaEHoward George Eustice @pow_rebecca etc about this (among other things) but @DefraGovUK  @EnvAgency press office told me they were unavailable, which is odd, because I didn't specify a time or date. 
https://t.co/2tFq4IdSr2

tweets.text: @NorthernGather2 @TonyJuniper @spainshall @DefraGovUK @pow_rebecca @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency Hello, beaver wetlands formed by Eurasian beavers tend to create a mosaic or series of dams, canals & ponds, unlikely to all burst at once. Instead they increase capacity & reinforce each other. If one bursts, another often takes up the slack. Time to reimagine our rivers...

tweets.text: Today we let the water through our first completed #FishPassage the RiverSevern 🙌 #LetItFlow #FishPassage @severnrivers @EnvAgencyMids @CRTWalesandSW @CanalRiverTrust @fishmigration @LIFEprogramme @HeritageFundM_E @kiergroup https://t.co/M5LzxjUZNu

A compelling and devastating round-up of the calamity facing England's rivers and the "Hotbed of mediocrity", that is the @EnvAgency.

Great stuff by @RachSalv https://t.co/d01T1Ts2Ft

Our ports could be hiding #WasteCrime activity. 
 
Waste criminals try to profit from selling and exporting waste abroad, leaving it for someone else to deal with and potentially harming the environment. 
 
Our port officers work to stop this waste from travelling abroad 👇 https://t.co/vgNsZEAPtV

tweets.text:
The  @ShropClimate conference aims to create a #ShropshireClimateAction plan for South Shropshire to achieve net zero carbon by 2030. 

Join the FREE zoom conference tomorrow to hear from experts and share ideas for making change happen.
Register here: https://t.co/SvkmDkO0bd https://t.co/ZDU60MOlv7

Good old @EnvAgency does it again. Missed its own performance target by nearly 25%.

Aim for 2019 - 20, "Enhance", 2,300 kilometres of rivers, lakes and coastal waters.

Result? Fail!

Question. What exactly do you mean by "enhanced"? How is that defined, who makes that decision? https://t.co/9x3KDtkqDj

Transporting waste around the world is part of a multi-million-pound industry, and waste criminals can take advantage of this.  

Port officer Melvyn blogs about how he helps prevent illegal exports of waste to help protect our environment: https://t.co/p2B04tOYSo https://t.co/qCRbaZGPzr
Really good news that Government endorsed the #FCERMStrategy today gives us significant encouragement for NFM and natural capital solutions with @EnvAgency https://t.co/csx07gPDU8

tweets.text: REMINDER: Tests carried out at Earlswood Lakes on 24 Aug confirm a case of blue-green algae. Visitors should avoid contact with the water and dog owners should not let their pets swim or drink from the lakes. The algae releases toxins that can be harmful to humans and dogs https://t.co/Y4W64qZSXn

tweets.text: Wetlands can play a big role in protecting us against the effects of climate change. Great to see @EnvAgency go ahead with their new floods strategy, making more use of natural flood management. Let’s make this happen, creating more wetlands as part of a #greenbluerecovery 💧 💙 https://t.co/f8ENvaXQuk

tweets.text: Pioneering #NFM techniques are being implemented as part of #FCERMStrategy. Bunds are long, low mounds on that hold water in shallow pools. We set up a conservation technique trial this year to investigate how effective bunds can be in making the moorland landscape more resilient https://t.co/FSe9kgau5A

tweets.text: @SoilsAlliance @suesustainable @EnvAgency The EA was put into DEFRA (wholly owned subsidiary of NFU)?  so they don't upset the farmers.  Take away most of their budget and they haven't got enough people to do the work.  Most of the people round here think that water courses are a waste disposal system.

Some exciting news today! The Fairhaven to Church Scar Scheme, which protects over 2,400 properties from coastal erosion, has been shortlisted in the Climate Resilience Project of the Year category in the British Construction Industry Awards 👏👏

Image credit to @VolkerWesselsUK https://t.co/J1NlSTwTAO

tweets.text:
Enforcement teams are working across Greater Manchester to monitor flytipping. They will investigate and prosecute where appropriate. 

Please help us keep Salford clean, report fly tipping if you see it!  
https://t.co/jHO9KnyCf2
 
#SCRAPFlytipping @recycle4gm @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/QoWhSDsq0O

Gully-blocking is one of the techniques that we are using to support the #FCERMStrategy, released today. Gully-blocking is a keystone to the #BuildingBlocks project currently underway across the South Pennines SAC, raising the water table & slowing the flow of water off the hill. https://t.co/jiE6mqKaW4

Great night in watching the @ICESouthWest Awards last night! Delighted the A38 @StoverPark Wetlands scheme won 2 awards! 🏆🏆🍾 A fantastic collaboration between @HighwaysSWEST @StoverPark @DevonCC @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Chevron @MabeyHire JW Baron Earthworks @WBM_news https://t.co/2jQ35DvIvW
